welcome_message_body: Welcome to Teresina, where the warm hospitality matches the city's year-round sunshine. Known for its beautiful parks, lively markets, and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
